summary: Miraak was kind of a pushover, this mod aims to fix that.
descriptionHtml:
Vanilla/Normal Miraak was way too weak, and died way too fast, so the fight was over way too quickly. 

Simple description for a simple mod
_______________________________________

I: 
Upped his max- and minimum level (35) slightly.
Gave him a health boost. 
Gave him some additional shouts.
Gave him some additional spells.
Gave him some additional resistances.
Gave him some additional spells.
Gave him some additional perks.

This made the fight 100x more fun and challenging for me. 

I also made a harder version of this mod. Larger health boost, and a minimum level of 75.

New! Badass version uploaded. In case the harder version wasn\'t hard enough. 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
Installation: 
Unpack into your Skyrim/Data folder. It\'s a single esp.file.

Use either the basic or the harder version. Not both.
____________________________________________________________________________________________

If he\'s still to weak for your lvl 1337 - Lord of Death Mountain Character, leave a comment (his health is too low/attacks to weak etc) and I\'ll fix it for you.

/Surjamte
author: Surjamte
